idea:
TimePay helps small & medium businesses get paid in time. It functions like a virtual collections managers and automates various collections tasks such as follow-ups, reconciliation, credit analysis and cash flow forecasting. 


TimePay has saved its clients an average 13 days in collections cycle.
name: SUNYAM LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We provide Trusteeship services for Alternative Investment Funds, Escrow Agent, ESOP/Employee Welfare Trusts, Family Office Trustee, Security Trustee, Third-party agent, Trustees for private trusts and public charitable trusts, Document/Share escrow Trustee, etc.
name: CREDENTIA TRUSTEESHIP SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Headlines of Today Media Pvt. Ltd., a media company, which is known for delivering a wide variety of national as well as global news to its viewers, with content ranging across categories of Politics, to Lifestyle, Entertainment, Technology, and Sports, and all the other fields like automobile, Travel, Education, Career and whatnot, we aim to ensure quality content for each user. Having a team of experienced journalists, content writers, and excellent technology partners on board, we thrive to ensure that the user experience on the website keeps getting better every day. Since its inception, within a span of 7 years, we have gained unmatched trust by all our viewers, we promise to maintain trust and surely increase it with time.With this motivation and conviction, we aim to become the definitive source of information and knowledge for people.
name: HEADLINES OF TODAY MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Farmer Club is a startup which is based on the idea of innovation in agriculture domain by developing alternative farming model which will result in paradigm shift of growing practices. The primary objective is to develop and utilize solutions for modern farming.
name: The Farmer Club

idea: We are a multimedia service provider, with expertise in VFX, Commercials, CG Animation, Live Action Films, and TV/OTT. Our core team is having more than 20 years of experience in this industry.

idea: FPL is setup as a technology platform company and would manage end-to-end user experience and would partner with regulated entities like banks to issue the credit cards and lend to end-consumers and the entire outstanding will be on the balance-sheet of the partner entities.
